resources.string: While screen is on, file sync is disabled. When screen is off, a file sync is called to flush all outstanding writes and restore file sync operation as normal. Turn this off for better data integrity in lieu of performance.
This allows user to force AC charging for any charger that is detected as USB (e.g. many car chargers).
Enable sweep2wake feature (NOTE: This feature is currently in experimental state and it can cause unexpected side effects.)
